name: start
description: Save your list of tasks in your phone and start

scripts.build:ui: rm -rf build && cd Front && npm install && npm run build --prod && cp -r build ..
scripts.save: git add . && git commit -m AppUpdate && git push
scripts.deploy: npm run save && git push heroku master
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && npm run deploy

author: SubroBlack
